title: Boston Celtics Coach Ime Udoka Rose Fast and Fell Hard
description: Weeks after the Celtics abruptly suspended Udoka for the season, itâ€™s still not entirely clear why. Some who have known him are struggling to make sense of the situation.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola and Sopan Deb
media:description: Ime Udoka, who landed his first head coaching job with the Boston Celtics last year, has been suspended for the 2022-23 season.
